_documentation.arrive_message: Message shown to others when player arrives (may contain {0} for player name)
_documentation.depart_message: Message shown to others when player departs (may contain {0} for player name)

teleporters.player_message: You just fell through a trap door in the floor!
teleporters.arrive_message: {0} has just fallen into the room through a trap door in the ceiling!
teleporters.depart_message: {0} has just fallen through a trap door in the floor!

teleporters.player_message: A sudden flash of light momentarily blinds you!
teleporters.arrive_message: {0} has just appeared in a blinding flash of light!
teleporters.depart_message: {0} has just vanished in a blinding flash of light!

teleporters.player_message: A cloud of thick black smoke suddenly engulfs you!
teleporters.arrive_message: {0} has just appeared in a puff of thick black smoke!
teleporters.depart_message: {0} has just vanished in a puff of thick black smoke!

teleporters.player_message: A spring loaded pressure plate rapidly lifts you through the ceiling!
teleporters.arrive_message: {0} just appeared suddenly through an aperature in the floor!
teleporters.depart_message: {0} was just lifted rapidly through the ceiling on a column of stone!
